ValidationRule.description: Cannot change status of a case with open Children
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: (TEXT(Status)="Resolved" || TEXT(Status)="New" || TEXT(Status)="In Progress" || TEXT(Status)="Closed") && Open_Children_Cases_Counter__c > 0 && (RecordType.DeveloperName = "DE_Inbound_Case" || RecordType.DeveloperName = "CD_Inbound_Case" || RecordType.DeveloperName = "PY_Inbound_Case" || RecordType.DeveloperName = "Talabat_Inbound_Case" || RecordType.DeveloperName = "AT_Inbound_Case") && NOT($Permission.Exclude_from_Validation)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Cannot change status of a case if there are open child cases
